text: oh inu anthu okhulupirira! Musayandikire mapemphero pamene muli oledzera mpaka pamene mudziwa tanthauzo la zimene muli nkunena ndiponso pamene mwakhala malo ndi a kunyumba kwanu ndipo simunasambe kupatula pamene muli pa ulendo. Ndipo ngati muli nkudwala kapena muli pa ulendo kapena mmodzi mwa inu wachokera ku chimbudzi kapena mwagona limodzi ndi akazi anu, ndipo simudapeze madzi, tapani dothi labwino ndipo mupukute nkhope ndi manja anu. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi wa chifundo ndi okhululukira
